official_title: A bill regarding permitted public uses within the DeSoto National Wildlife Refuge, Iowa.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to permit power boating and water skiing during the summer months in the eastern half of the lake in the DeSoto National Wildlife Refuge, Iowa, with specified restrictions.

titles.title: A bill regarding permitted public uses within the DeSoto National Wildlife Refuge, Iowa.
